casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Edward Crouch (11113)

Daly, Freedman and Cretella, Js.

Argued January 11 — decision released February 2, 1993 Stephen V. Moran, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Marjorie Allen Dauster, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were JohnM. Bailey, state’s attorney, and Warren Maxwell, senior assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
